thread.title: Ishita Katyal, Saad Nasser, Soumya Tejam: Child prodigies from whom Anand Mahindra wanted to take an autograph!
thread.title_full: Ishita Katyal, Saad Nasser, Soumya Tejam: Child prodigies from whom Anand Mahindra wanted to take an autograph! - The Financial Express

author: FE Online
title: Ishita Katyal, Saad Nasser, Soumya Tejam: Child prodigies from whom Anand Mahindra wanted to take an autograph!
text:
Saad is a co-founder of Ati Motors, an autonomous vehicle startup based in Bangalore. There are industry veterans like Aditya Puri, Anand Mahindra with whom we want to click selfies. Then there are those with whom people like Anand Mahindra want to take an autograph! Yes, we aren’t joking! Anand Mahindra was a speaker at NASSCOM India Leadership Forum 2017 where he met three child prodigies – Ishita, a 11-year old TED &TEDYouth Speaker, Saad, co-founder of Ati Motors, an autonomous vehicle startup based in Bangalore and Soumya, Founder and CEO BookBite. Mahindra was so fascinated by them and their achivements that when these three approached him for a selfie, he in turn asked them for their autographs! “Prodigies at NASSCOM. Ishita, 11yrs,motivational speaker; Saad & Soumya, start-up founders. They wanted selfies; I made a deal & got their autographs,” he tweeted. Here is all you want to know about these prodigies!
Ishita Katyal: Author, TEDx Licensee & Motivational Speaker
Ishita Katyal, 11 years is an Author & Motivational speaker. She has spoken at the prestigious global TED Conference in Vancouver, TEDYouth in New York, TEDxGateway, NASSCOM, Mind Mingle @IIM Ahmedabad, Toastmasters & REX conclive events etc. She is the youngest TEDxYouth organiser in the Asia-Pacific region. She was also facilitated with 2015 Sakhi Samman award from Lokmat and REX Karmaveer Chakra Award and REX Global Fellowship 2014-15.
She likes to write, dance and sing and loves to play basketball, is an avid reader and digs into Sudha Murthy and Ruskin Bond in her free time. She is author of “Simran’s Diary” which she wrote only at an age of 8. Ishita is one of the youngest Author’s in India and was also featured in the Child Magazine as one amongst the 8 Child Prodigies in India. She is also the youngest indian ever to speak at the prestigious global TED Conference.
Prodigies at NASSCOM.Ishita,11yrs,motivational speaker;Saad&Soumya,start-up founders.They wanted selfies; I made a deal&got their autographs pic.twitter.com/yIC3A4PaUb
— anand mahindra (@anandmahindra) February 20, 2017
